games.name: R6 EMOTES
games.description: If you got your own suggestion/animation you've made, DM @mrcoolperson79 on discord R6 Emotes is a laid-back hangout game focused on classic R6 animations and community-made emotes. We have over 10+ emotes that you can use whilst listening to songs via your radio!1! UPDATE [3.4] NPCs - Added 3 new NPCs with custom dialogue (slingshot's special update) UPDATE [3.3] CHRISTMAS - just changed the map UPDATE [3.2] UPDATE + Added sync, have the same animation and click on their torso (TESTING) UPDATE[3.1] MINOR UPDATE + The pumpkins on the house sway now + New icon UPDATE [3] Emote Update(s) +2 new emotes (ab1's dance, Headless) -1 emote (Jumpstyle) (Duplicated on accident) -smoother animations Map Update(s) + Spleef Arena + Teleporters + Halloween map !Staff Team! + furry (Creator/Owner) + 777 (Developer/Co-Owner) + slingshot (Developer/Ingame Staff) + 111 (Tester/Ingame Staff)
